[[Saba Qom F.C.|Saba Battery]] faced [[Sepahan Esfahan FC|Sepahan]] in this final game. The first leg took place on Jun 09, 2007 at 17:00 [[Iran Standard Time|local time]] ([[UTC+3:30]]) at [[Derakhshan Stadium]] in [[Robat Karim]] and the second leg took place on Jun 16, 2007 at 16:30 [[Iran Standard Time|local time]] ([[UTC+3:30]]) at [[Naghsh-e-Jahan Stadium|Naghsh Jahan Stadium]], [[Esfahan]]. == Format == The rules for the final were exactly the same as the one in the previous knockout rounds. The tie was contested over two legs with [[Away goals rule|away goals]] deciding the winner if the two teams were level on goals after the second leg. If the teams could still not be separated at that stage, then [[extra time]] would have been played with a [[Penalty shootout (association football)|penalty shootout]] (taking place if the teams were
